document_data.name: Pit of the Ghuls
document_data.mainbody: The '''Pit of the Ghuls''' was a dangerous valley in the [[High Desert]] of [[Zakhara]].
document_data.Description:
The Pit of the Ghuls was a deep valley surrounded by ring of [[granite]] cliffs. Many of the cliffs had their own passages that tunneled deep into the ground, providing an easy way for adventurers to get hopelessly lost. A constant stench of decay permeated the cliffs and pit, carried by the constant winds ripping across the desert.

Salt water could be found here in the form of the [[Lake of the Ghuls]], located in the northern section of the pit.
document_data.Rumors & Legends: Rumor said that giant statues carved of [[gold]], [[silver]], [[turquoise]], [[onyx]], [[emerald]], [[amber]], and [[ruby]] could be found somewhere within the pit, but dangerous creatures proved more than a challenge for treasure seekers. The arm of a turquoise statue was successfully recovered and came to rest in [[Ajayib]].
